column4: I recently aquired a portable scanner called "travelscanner pro" and i tried looking for linux drivers and I tried sane also but I cannot get it to work. Can anyone please direct me toward some help?
does the device connected and power on right now?
it doesnt have a power button, just plug it in and go
xsane scans and doesnt find anything
well i dident get the install cd with it, but on windows i searched for the driver and downloaded a scanning program
sorry to say this, not supported by sane
so what would you recomend doing from here? Is there anyway I can use wine to get it to work?
do you think if I run that windows scanning program in wine I can get it to work?
Can I PM you about this to clear the chan abit?
Can you PM me instead first?
